title: The Nomadic Professional Model
prompt: An early morning overhead shot of a worn county road map spread across a kitchen table with a coffee cup, notebook, and reading glassesâ€”golden light streaming through a window illuminating the creases and annotations on the map. The composition emphasizes the practical planning and movement inherent in serving dispersed rural communities, with soft focus on farmland visible through the window in the background. Shot in documentary style with natural, muted tones that convey routine, responsibility, and the texture of rural logistics rather than crisis or hardship.
